name: BuildTableTweak
description:
WARNIGN: This mod will do nothing without
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1710620926
Do not use it without that mod.

It's a tweak mod which allows carpenters to operate on builder's workbench. This reduces crafting cost and speed depends on thrall level (up to x2).

Because it affects balance and make life easier I've splited them to two mods. Use as you prefer.
